The following data layers are used in Baltic Health Index global calculations for goal status, trend, pressures, and resilience. Learn how these layers were incorporated into goal calculations on the [goals page](goals.html).

<br>

#### LAYERS TABLE

```{r, echo = FALSE}
format_df <- as.data.frame(st0 %>% select(Description = info, Layer = name, Targets = targets))
layers_widget_formattable = formattable(
  format_df,
  align = c("l", "r", "r"),
  list(
    `Targets` = color_tile('lightblue', 'white'),
    `Layer` = formatter("span", style = ~ style(color = "#78abaf", font.weight = "300"))
  )
)
layers_widget_formattable
# DT::datatable(format_df)
```
